title: On320 Luxury Apartment ( Developer John Keels )
details:
On Three 20- Developer John Keels- In Colombo 02
A brand new, fully-furnished, 2 bedroom apartment for sale at OnThree 20. This 907 Sq. Ft. apartment offers 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a living area with balcony and a great view of the city. It is also fully tilled and air-conditioned and includes a parking slot in the car park.
Facilities include a building management system, standby power, broadband infrastructure, swimming pool/lap pool/kiddies pool, a gymnasium, a large club house, squash court,
• 24 Hour Security,Fully AC, Brand New
Rs,39 Million ( USD 250,000/= )
No Brokers please
